message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to start with a price of $140. Is this something you'd like to consider?
I appreciate your offer, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $130. Would you be willing to consider that price?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. However, I've got some costs to consider. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get at least $145 for the product. Can we discuss further?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $135?

I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. However, I've got to make a living. I'm willing to compromise further, but I need to get at least $142 for the product. Can we meet in the middle again?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $137?
I'm getting close to my minimum, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll meet you at $140, but that's as low as I can go. Can you meet me there?
I understand you're getting close to your minimum, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $138?

I'm not going to go any lower than my minimum, Bob. I've already compromised quite a bit. I'll stick with my previous offer of $140. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'll have to consider other options.
